title: enda vidam tAnO
sahitya:
enda vidam tAnO undanaruL peruvEnO kandanE endanadu kavalai vilaga nAn


anupallavi

  indap-pArinil bandha pAsham adanAlE cintai nondu naindu sidaindiDu munnE


caraNam    samsAramAghum perum sAgarattE nAnurum himsai kuraiyavillai immiyumidu varai
ammAn shemmAlin arumai marugA un aDiyE tAn gati enap-piDittiDum aDiyEn
